Message:
“I would destroy
the world for my child.”

Whenever I’d read books
with that line of thinking,
I’d find them to be illogical.

Weighing the life of one
against the rest of humanity?
It would be ludicrous to compare.

The average lifespan of
a homunculus is three days.

Little A has marvelously
lived for one year,

but that miracle
won’t last much longer.

I’ll make sure she lives longer,
even if it’s just a day.

...all the while knowing
it would result in
the end of the world.

The project succeeds as expected,
conjuring forth an angel.

The archangel of
the seventh Sephirah—
Haniel, the Angel of Love.

Little A was made to
host the Angel of Love
within her body.
How ironic.

that she wished for
a love that wasn’t
meant to exist.
